job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Tech College
job.description: West Creek 2 12072 United States of America Richmond VirginialtbrgtltbrgtMachine Learning Engineer  Tech CollegeltbrgtltbrgtAre you a high performing technologist passionate about cutting edge machine learning developments Do you enjoy reading and investigating advancements in applied machine learning and solution white papers Do you leverage both battletested algorithms and newer techniques Are you the goto mentor and teacher in your organization and community for others who want to learn more about machine learning As a member of Capital Ones machine learning community in our Tech College organization youll be part of an elite group thats spreading knowledge and understanding about machine learning to experienced machine learning practitioners newcomers to the art and executives who need to make decisions regarding machine learning utilization and projectsltbrgtltbrgtLearning is now a continuous lifelong activity Since tech skills now have a halflife of about two and half years how could it be any other way Recognizing this Capital one established Tech College in 2017 to revolutionize the learning experience for associates In particular Tech College is ltemgttechnologistdrivenltemgt Yes we do have experts in learning and educational design But its the subject matter experts in machine learning data engineering cloud cyber mobile software engineering and agile that set the direction and curate or create the learning contentltbrgtltbrgtAs a Machine Learning Engineer in the Machine Learning Discipline of Capital Ones Tech College youll be part of a team responsible for curating designing developing and delivering highly engaging learning experiences that will fuel our growth as a tech company and help our associates develop cuttingedge skills in machine learning and artificial intelligence Well also expect you to keep up with the latest and greatest machine learning tools and capabilities so that you can lead Capital Ones machine learning community You will work alongside highly technical peers with deep domain expertise from cyber threat prevention to sophisticated NLP to deliver game changing learning experiences for our associates Youll also be expected to work with our university partners in getting creative about ML learning Tech College is a great spot from which to learn about Capital Ones broader machine learning community so you can spot your next great opportunity for whenever youre ready to move back into fulltime project deliveryltbrgtltbrgtTech College is a bold investment in developing our associates and leaders recruiting top technical talent and continuing to differentiate ourselves in the market Tech College aims to transform our approach to enabling our associates and leaders with the technical skills they need to be successful in current and future rolesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWho You AreltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtExperienced You need to have earned a few bumps and bruises while developing and implementing machine learning solutions to business problemsltligtltligtInnovative You continually research and evaluate emerging technologies You stay current on published stateoftheart methods technologies and applications and seek out opportunities to apply themltligtltligtA leader You challenge conventional thinking and work with stakeholders to identify and improve the status quo Youre passionate about talent developmentltligtltligtTechnical Youre comfortable with opensource languages and are passionate about developing further You have handson experience developing data science solutions using opensource tools and cloud computing platformsltligtltligtStatisticallyminded Youve built models validated them and backtested them You know how to interpret a confusion matrix or a ROC curve You have experience with a variety of applications such as clustering classification regression sentiment analysis time series or deep learningltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtIn This Role You WillltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtPartner with a crossfunctional team of data scientists software engineers product managers and learning specialists to develop and deliver a learning product that people loveltligtltligtTeach a broad stack of technologies  Python Tensorflow ScikitLearn AWS H2O Spark and more  for revealing the insights hidden within huge volumes of numeric and textual dataltligtltligtTeach others how to build and deploy machine learning models through all phases of development from design through training evaluation validation and implementationltligtltligtFlex your interpersonal skills to translate the complexity of your work into tangible business goalsltligtltligtCurate existing content from various sources like universities commercial content providers and publicly available materialltligtltligtDevelop and conduct training through a variety of modes in person online selfpaced blendedltligtltligtCreate handson challenges to highlight Capital One data business problems and practicesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBasic QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors DegreeltligtltligtAt least 2 years of experience working with machine learningltligtltligtAt least 1 year of experience working with Python Scala Java or MatlabltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMasters Degree or PhD in a STEM field science technology engineering mathematicsltligtltligt1 year of experience working with a public cloud AWS Microsoft Azure or Google Cloudltligtltligt3 years of experience in machine learningltligtltligt3 years of experience in Python Scala or Rltligtltligt1 year of experience in teaching or creating curriculum contentltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtAt this time Capital One will not sponsor a new applicant for employment authorization for this positionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtJob Category  Information
